import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import './Cart.css' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { addToCart, clearCart, decreaseCart, getTotals, removeFromCart } from '../store/CartSlice' function Cart() { const cart = useSelector(state=>state.cart) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getTotals) },[cart,d]) const handleRemoveFromCart =(cartItem)=>{ dispatch(removeFromCart(cartItem)) } const handleDecreaseCart = (cartItem)=>{ dispatch(decreaseCart(cartItem)) } const handleIncreaseQuantity = (cartItem)=>{ dispatch(addToCart(cartItem)) } const handleClearCart = ()=>{ dispatch(clearCart()) } return (

Shopping Cart

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Your Cart is currently empty

Start Shopping
):(<>

Product

Price

Quantity

total

{cart.cartItems?.map(cartItem =>

{cartItem.name}

{cartItem.desc}

â‚ª{cartItem.price}
{cartItem.cartQuantity}
{cartItem.price * cartItem.cartQuantity}
)}
Subtotal {cart.cartTotalAmount}

Taxes and shipping calculated at checkout

Continue Shopping
)}
) } export default Cart
